snippet: Most tables at Space Billiards in Koreatown are the standard six-pocket variety, but those without holes are for four-ball billiards, a preferred game in South Korea.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Space Billiards, pool hall in Manhattan's Koreatown that caters to South Korean immigrants and others who are passionate about game.
lead_paragraph: Most tables at Space Billiards in Koreatown are the standard six-pocket variety, but those without holes are for four-ball billiards, a preferred game in South Korea.
